name: Benderman VR
description: Benderman VR - A retro pipeline puzzler! Bend pipes in VR, beat the clock and collect wrenches while staying under the pipe budget. Nostalgic 80s-90s style.Will you be a Plumbing Maestro or a Drenched Dabbler?

name: EA Sports WRC
description:
EA Sports WRC boasts 10 current WRC, WRC2, and Junior WRC vehicles and 68 of the most iconic rally cars spanning 60 years of the sport.

Working together with official WRC teams and manufacturers, such as Ford, Toyota, and Hyundai, each vehicle is built to tackle every challenge they'll face throughout the season. The hybrid-powered 4WD Rally1 cars are some of the fastest in the sport's history, capable of incredible speeds while tackling gravity-defying jumps, deteriorating surfaces, and adverse weather.

name: Godzilla Voxel Wars
description: Get ready to battle using your brain! A full-fledged turn-based strategy game with a difficulty level: GODZILLA! Godzilla, Mothra, King Ghidorah, and more are here to rampage across an 8x8 grid! Control Toho monsters and save the world from the Fungoid mushroom invasion!

name: Darkless
description: Nameless embodies a mischievous ghost who after a terrible curse has been placed on him, locking him in a lamp. It will be your purpose to recover your ghostly body by traveling through all the corners of the Silent Mansion in a platform and puzzle game.

name: Traitorous Trek
description: Welcome to Traitorous Trek ! Immerse yourself in a universe teeming with deception, betrayal, and nail-biting tension. As a member of an interstellar fleet, your mission is to unravel the hidden shadows lurking within, thwart the conspirators' plans, and safeguard the future of humanity.

name: Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy
description: Welcome to "Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy", a captivating 3D cooking adventure set in the heart of the old North. Assume the role of a Viking Chef and dive headfirst into the culinary chaos of a bustling Norse kitchen. Your mission? To serve the gods a feast of legendary proportions.

name: Ad Mortem
description: ''Ad Mortem'' (It means "Forward to Death" in Latin) it's a MBF21 - Halloween-themed community project organized and made by anonymous users from 4chan's Retro Games board. This mapset contains 27 playable maps (24 "Single player" maps, 3 Secret maps and Deathmatch support [MAP05, MAP07, MAP08]) uses a great variety of custom textures that matches the spooky environment (includes GothicTX, OTEX textures and others. read the .txt file for more info.) This community project contains New reskinned weapons, Graphics and 7 new custom enemies. Grab your SMG and let's celebrate this spooky month slaughtering some skelli-bois and ghouls!

name: Talented
description: Slay waves of spooky enemies for 20 nights to survive 'The Demonic Conveyor Belt'. Talented is an arcade roguelite with randomly generated skill trees. Choose your upgrades and abilities wisely and you might just make it out alive. Are you truly Talented?

name: Disruptive
description: Immerse yourself in a first-person sci-fi horror experience, trapped in a desolate laboratory. Explore its dark corridors, unveil its horrors and find your way to survival, as you are stalked by atrocious threats. Question yourself, make decisions and discover your destiny.

name: The Severn Rising 2222
description: A graphic adventure set 200 years in the future in the flooded city of Worcester. Who were the humans? Why did they have to leave? Where are they now? Guide a swan and a duck as they attempt to find out.

name: Mystery Lover
description: Wei who's in the supernatural club must solve the missing virtual idol incident with his girlfriend Bansha.

name: Battle for the Board
description: Adventure through a colorful tabletop-themed world, strategically rolling special moves and attacks to defeat enemy pieces in this turn-based action strategy game!

name: The Endless Dream
description: Dive into an enigmatic world, solve captivating puzzles, and unravel the mysteries of an endless dream. Reconstruct a fragmented life as the line between reality and illusion blurs. Challenge your mind and uncover the hidden truth in a gripping adventure that will leave you amazed!

name: Leaf Fragments
description: A war chess game that showcases the differences in the systems of different countries.

name: Jusant
description: Enjoy meditative vibes in Jusant, an action-puzzle climbing game. Scale an immeasurably tall tower and ascend to new heights alongside your watery companion. Master your climbing tools, find your way up through diverse biomes, and piece together the tower's past.

name: HeadBangers: Rhythm Royale
description: Headbangers: Rhythm Royale is a rhythm-based battle royale game where players (pigeons?) compete in mini-games to become the master headbanger.

name: Enypnion Redreamed
description: Enter a surreal adventure that delves deep into the subconscious mind of a young boy. Guided by a dream spirit, solve puzzles and explore a realm of eerie wonder, as you find your way back into the waking world. An illusory adventure redreamed!

name: Costa Verde Transport Department
description: In Costa Verde you play as the Transport Department of a city slowly growing on a vibrant picturesque landscape. Build roads on a map of hexagonal tiles, plan road intersections, place roundabouts, plan out bus routes, and watch your whole city turn into one single massive traffic jam!

name: Remore: Infested Kingdom
description: A challenging turn-based tactical RPG that transports you into a medieval apocalyptic infestation. Your survivors are fragile, and every step you take could be your last.

name: Pirate Patrol
description: Manage anti-piracy operations and secure important trade lines. Command your carier and send your fighter pilots on missions. Find and train new officers and pilots, on procedural game universe map. Equip your ship with new weapons and equipment.

name: The Foglands
description: Run into the unknown, fight monsters, scavenge loot, and try to make it back before you are swallowed by the fog. The Foglands is an atmospheric roguelike adventure where you’ll discover new paths and uncover old secrets.

name: Innocent Critters
description: An online party game where 2-12 players venture into a procedurally generated forest in search of food. With supplies limited, you will have to decide who will make it out alive and who will not!

name: Undead Quest
description:
Undead Quest is a fun VR arcade game built and optimized specifically for Oculus Quest 2.

With the help of a bat, ball and a few spells, you’ll fight against hordes of funny undead creatures - skeletons, zombies, mummies and even a mad cow.

You play as a student on a magical university cricket team in a fantasy world. After your team's victory in the tournament semi-finals and a rowdy night of celebration, you wake up in the forest. Barely having opened your eyes, you see a crowd of the undead heading straight for you. A crazy situation even for a fantasy world, frankly.

Can you beat the challenges to find out why the undead are here and how to get rid of them? Prepare your hands, feet, and mind - Undead Quest is waiting for you.

name: The Bunnyman
description: TheBunnyMan is a psychological horror inspired on newspaper and police archives. Police in Virginia has issued a public appeal to find a pregnant woman after reports of her missing. Her husband, a journalist is out to find her after the police search went cold. Something Evil is lurking...

name: Ghostland Yard
description: Uncover the truth about the Ghostland Yard investigators disappearance in this challenging 2D precision platformer. Travel across the world in more than 250 hand-crafted levels to find your friends!

name: Nociception: Voltaic Marketplace
description: A fantasy bullet hell on a strange, familiar planet. Fight the living and the dead alike as you figure out what's causing all this energy in the air! Play as a troupe of living puppets, curious immortal children, or a demon, and be sure to pick up journal pages on the way!

name: OctoRaid VR
description: OctoRaid VR is a Cross-Platform-Based Asymmetric PvP VR Party Game in which you become an Octo or Hunter character and Fight against each other. If you access a VR device, you play Octo, a Giant Octopus Monster, and if you access Only PC or Mobile, you play Hunter, a Employee with a Diver concept.

name: Fear of the Darkness
description: Fear Of The Darkness is a narrative psychologic game that will push you to face the phobias of some patients. Through different game phases you will look for Brightness. Be careful not to get overwhelmed by their emotional burden, step out of the Darkness and explore the various corners of Truth.

name: You Will Die Here Tonight
description: Explore in top-down retro aesthetics and face the horrors of Breckenridge Hall in pulse-pounding first person combat. Scavenge for supplies, solve puzzles, and upgrade your gear. Do whatever it takes to survive, but remember: You Will Die Here Tonight.

name: Little Goody Two Shoes
description:
Little Goody Two Shoes is an tactical narrative RPG that tells the story of Elise, an ambitious girl stuck in a village too small for her big dreams. In this village of Kieferberg you’ll have to work toward your main goal - hiding an innocent witch from the merciless villagers.

Lies, deception, strategic choices and treachery! In this bizarre fairy tale all choices matter in order to protect your reputation and get what you truly desire.

All means justify the end, or do they?

name: Deeply Dark
description: Take on the challenge of the Legendary gauntlet. Look for a way to overcome the corruption that is in it. Face anyone who wants to stop you and become a guardian once and for all.

name: Schloss der Wölfe
description: Schloss der Wölfe ("Castle of the Wolves") is a minimalist World War II first-person shooter with a classic horror twist.

name: Sonic Chaos Remake
description: A fan-made remake of Sonic Chaos by Laiker_2003

name: Heretic's Fork: Abyssal Update
description: Abyssal Update brings a new OST DLC, New Desktop Customizations, New Character Variants, New Achievements and a new “Torment Mode”!

name: Rabbit Horror Show
description: One would never believe that something as extraordinary as this could happen to oneself, but fate had an unusual twist in store for me. Yesterday, as the dark storm clouds gathered ominously in the sky, a bolt of lightning, like a celestial spear, found its target, and that target was me. The force of nature's wrath struck me with a ferocity that defied reason. Incredibly, I did not succumb to death's cold embrace, nor did I bear any visible wounds. It was as if the universe had chosen me for a different fate, one that would lead me to a realm beyond imagination.

name: Your World According to a Single Word
description: Sin descripción

name: Watch out!!!
description: Immerse yourself in the exciting feats of Oto, a small but very brave firefighter cat, who ventures into a burning building, avoiding dangerous debris to save other cats. Help him in his daring battle for survival and rescue the kittens in distress.

name: Spooky Shopping Tour!
description: Spooky Shopping Tour is a visual novel, where the end goal is to customize your shop! Get to know the characters and try appealing to their tastes in order to obtain their ending!

name: Nightmare at Famine Springs
description: A Lonely Child prepares to Trick 'r Treat for Halloween.

name: Hanzala Returns
description: You play as Hanzala, a 10 year old Palestinian kid who just wants to go to his home and avoid getting captured or killed by the occupation forces.

name: Metroid: Juicy Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: Grassland Survivors
description: A Vampire Survivors clone for PICO-8. You can level up, collect XP, increase your character stats, and more.

name: Fun Chess: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: (I see) Nothing
description: (I see) Nothing is a drama Visual Novel with little bit of horror and denpa in certain storylines. The game let's you choose MC's name as well as gender and the chosen gender does slightly affect the game's art.

name: Snack Pack 3: Trick or Treat
description: In the third installment of the Snack Pack series, mappers came together to contribute maps toward an 8-map Halloween-themed episode, with 3 extra maps in the hub as bonus levels. The pack includes a new 'Penetrator' stake gun weapon, the Rotary Shotgun from Dwell, and the Gaunt from Quoth as well as an updated Copper mod that features new Nightmare mechanics!

name: Faith Update v1.4: Good Christian Boy
description:
Praise the Unspeakable! One year after the release of Faith: The Unholy Trinity, it's time for a new challenge! In the new Survival mode, fight through an all-new environment facing every last demon we can throw at you. Can you escape with your life...and get the highest rank?

This v1.4 update includes the new Survival mode, a new hidden mode (!), new animated cutscenes, a new background to unlock, a brand-new music track, and more...tis

name: Halloween Puzzle
description:
Immerse yourself in a dark and mysterious world as you explore the enchanting atmosphere of Halloween in this classic card matching game. With four distinct difficulty levels to choose from – Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert – get ready for a thrilling adventure.
Amongst the cards featuring ghosts, witches, cauldrons, and more, you'll need to exercise your memory and concentration to uncover the perfect matches. You can start with Easy for a pleasant introduction, but true mastery awaits you in the challenging Expert mode.
The Halloween ambiance will captivate you at every level, adding an extra layer of excitement to the game. With spooky themes and mind-bending pairings, this game will provide hours of fun for you and your friends. Flip the cards, make the matches, and unveil the secrets of this mystical world

name: Tennis Pro Tournaments
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr. Supershot
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Land
description: Puzzle Land is a remake of the gameboy game Daedalian opus also known as puzzle road in japan.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 9
description: An erotic Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki and her husband meeting the Boss and his newest girlfriend for an unforgettable wild night.

name: OMSI 2: Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 2
description: Immerse yourself in an unrivalled driving experience and climb aboard and explore the city with the OMSI 2 Add-on Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 2.

name: Waven: Welcome Pack
description: You've been chosen by the goddess Cra, the deity of judgment who guides the World of Twelve's archers with a keen eye. She's decided to offer her blessing, in the form of a new Welcome Pack to help guide you in your Waven adventure!

name: Romans: Age of Caesar - Starter Pack
description: The Steam Starter Pack is perfect for new players looking to kick start their Roman domination in Romans Age Of Caesar.

name: Revolve A
description:
Revolve A is a fast-paced one-button game.

You control an arrow that is constantly moving and spinning around. Press a button to move in the direction which the arrow is currently facing. Enemies randomly appear from the sides of the screen and generate links between themselves. By crossing any of the links you score points and destroy all the network of this link.

The game is over when you hit any of the enemies.

name: Escape
description: One short Boom-compatible underground prison map requiring OTEX. Initially intended as MAP01 of a 4-map wad inspired by Unreal (1998) but it didn't end up working out.

name: District XiLin
description: This is a first-person city exploration game similar to a walking simulator. It is an open-world game that takes place in a real Chinese city called XiLin.

name: Lost Chapter: With You
description: Venture into the abyss once again to find out the protagonist's true identity! This DLC comes with new card system, bosses, events and many more!

name: They Are Coming
description: They Are Coming is a hybrid game that combines roguelike, tower defense, and base building in a side-scrolling shooter format. It offers a straightforward gaming experience for pure enjoyment.

name: Venus Puzzles
description: Come explore a unique world of beautiful women, unleash your puzzle solving skills, collect the most fascinating artworks, and enjoy endless enjoyment.

name: Crazy Cursed Grandma's House
description: Explore Japanese houses and deal with the curses that attack you!

name: GraveBond
description: You play as a young boy whose dog has died. Head down to Necros, the realm of the underworld, to find your dog and bring him back home!

name: Don't Touch the Purple
description: Don't Touch the Purple ("DTTP") is an endless side-scrolling arcade platformer where you make your way through a randomly generated assortment of levels and get as far as possible before dying.

name: Hell Hunter: Damned Soul
description: A story driven adventure horror audiogame in which you have to interact with room elements, survive to environment gimmicks and fight real time battles based only on stereo audio. Learn the enemy patterns and hear where the attacks come from to dodge their attacks in time and then attack.

name: Sempiternal
description: Sempiternal is a psychological thriller survival game. In the universe of back rooms, you will experience the loneliness to the fullest and find yourself in a different mystery in each level and get lost in the back rooms.

name: Vindictive Drive 2
description: Build Robot Maids to battle massive robots! Try to contain the massive invasion as you unveil a dark story of revenge. Go to the Wagie Cage, where Wagie(that's her name) will build them for you. The Maidbots are voiced by professional Anime dub, videogame and TV/Film VAs.

name: Vivaldia 2
description: Pitted against relentless robotic foes and navigating through dense and perilous jungles, scorching lava fields, and treacherous swamps, Vivaldia once again seems faced with an impossible challenge.   With the fate of the land in her hands – will Vivaldia rise to the occasion?

name: Know Your Limits
description: Know Your Limits is a speed run game with speed limits. You can increase your speed by collecting coins, but it wouldn't be always the best choice. Go through all the obstacles and get your highest score!

name: Umbra Halloween
description: Umbra Halloween is a surreal psychological horror game about the dead ones returning to life on a Halloween night.

name: Buried
description: You wake up buried alive. You are running out of oxygen and you can't remember how you got here. There must be a way out, can you figure it out in time?

name: Myrcella the Meandering Mage
description: “Myrcella the Meandering Mage” is comedic fantasy point-and-click adventure game and yuri dating sim. Follow Myrcella as she travels around the towns of the beautiful Kingdom of Falkenhorn, solves the townsfolks’ problems using her magic and charms the local ladies too! Adventure and romance await!

name: The Widow's Shadow
description:
Following her late husband’s funeral, a widow laments her loss. The townsfolk's whispers surround her every time she leaves the house, rumours she cannot avoid no matter how she tries.

Yet one night, everything she wishes to ignore will be laid bare as she steps into a twisted reality — one borne from her own heart.

name: Finite State Automaton Challenges
description: In this game, we will play with the simplest automaton model, Finite State Automaton, and use it to cope with 30 challenges.

name: Project Nasu
description: Project Nasu is a 2D action and puzzle platformer where you play as a lab experiment trying to escape an evil scientist’s laboratory. Play as Nasu, using his snout to fire projectiles that propel you backward to evade, and fend off threats. Solve puzzles by activating platforms and deactivating lasers to ultimately escape the facility and save Nasu.

name: Doma
description: Step into the concrete heart of the post-Soviet era in "Doma". Delve deep into the architectural psyche of a bygone epoch, and craft iconic Soviet panel buildings block by meticulous block. With every structure, you don't just build a building - you forge a piece of history.

name: Whispers in Paradise
description: "Whispers in Paradise" delves into the mysterious and supernatural journey of Emily and Sydney. When Emily's life takes an unexpected turn, her friend Sydney becomes determined to uncover the secrets lurking within Emily's haunted mansion. Exploring mansion's past, Sydney find a chilling revelation.

name: Doodle Harmony
description: Find and match 100 cute doodle pairs scattered all over the screen in this point-and-click game. Can you match them all

name: Enemy Trench
description: Enemy Trench is a Roguelike set during the First World War. You play as a British soldier fighting your way through enemy lines hoping to survive. You must contend with an onslaught of enemy soldiers, deadly terrain, gas attacks and more. Do you have what it takes to survive in the Enemy Trench?

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Tirsan Trailer Pack
description: Tirsan, based in Türkiye, is a top producer of high-quality trailers for business needs. With more than 45 years of experience, they are known for their creative designs, excellent construction, and great customer support.

name: The House
description: Escape from the house where it all began, collect items, weapons and level up. Travel between worlds and through time to reach your goal. Go discover the dark secrets of the House where it all began!

name: Home Restoration VR
description: Grab your tools, put your creative hat on, and get ready to restore, renovate, and create beautiful homes in Home Restoration. This game has been downloaded nearly 100 million times on mobile devices and now it’s available on VR! It’s time to bring old houses back to life and make dreams come true!

name: Kinduo 2: Frostbite
description: Kinduo 2 is a local co-op game where two elemental friends with unique abilities need to help each other to overcome obstacles! Create blocks of ice, burn or melt things, and combine your skills to create plants!

name: NSG: Missing Tales
description: In this new adventure, the group discovers that Tales has disappeared and it is up to them to find him and arrive in time for the Halloween party. Here, time is your biggest enemy, or perhaps an ally? Your choices will make you closer or further away from finding it.

name: Meowing Point
description: Point and meow. 3D hidden cat game. These creatures have been turned into stone. Find and save them all.

name: Labyrinthatory
description: The best puzzle-based top-down pixel art comedy collectathon adventure based in a retro futuristic formica punk science mansion ever made! Solve hundreds of puzzles with variable difficulty settings as you move through a comedy-mystery storyline.

name: Hoboman
description: Hoboman is a 2d sci-fi platformer with retro graphics and a wacky story. Play as Pluto the Voltran as you travel across the galaxy and thwart the evil Syndicat organization!

name: Necromancers' Arena
description: Enter the Necromancers' Arena with up to three other players in this cute, dystopian, twin-stick shooter!

name: Town of Illustive
description: A group of students from Falica High School have been dared by their classmate and class president Wade Severstone. Solving the mysteries that spread from generation to generation once and for all.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Plus
description:
Five Nights at Freddy's Plus, unofficially dubbed as FNAF Plus Restored is an indie point-and-click fangame developed by LostPawPlay, ripped direct from Phisnom's cancelled project Five Nights at Freddy's Plus. The final release of FNAF Plus Restored would release months after the official cancellation of Phisnom's Fazbear Fanverse project Five Nights at Freddy's Plus.

Later development on the game would be stopped due to controversy on the fan game and Five Nights at Freddy's creator, Scott Cawthon.

name: The Voidness
description: The Voidness is a Sci-fi psychological horror game where it takes place inside the void where it's filled with just gloom - the only way to see is by scanning the environment with your range finder device, however you are not alone. Don't breathe ... as they are listening.. and watching.

name: Phantom Rose 2 Sapphire
description: Phantom Rose 2 is a roguelike deckbuilding game by solo developer & artist makaroll. Fight and collect powerful cards as Aria, lost in her cherished school that’s now corrupted by evil creatures.

name: Shrieking Darkness
description: Close your eyes. Step into a world filled with nothing but darkness and terror, where everything wants to destroy you. Your time has come to fight the shrieking darkness, be brave and don't look back or you won't make it.

name: The Golden Eyed Ghosts
description: The Golden Eyed Ghosts is a dark fantasy soulslike heavily influenced by the legacy of Zelda adventures, set in the crumbling kingdom of Andromeda. As exiled warrior Orion, search for a way to restore his memories and unravel a terrifying conspiracy.

name: Lunacid
description: Lunacid is a first person dungeon crawler inspired by old FROMSOFT games like Shadow Tower and King’s Field.

name: Hippy Skate
description: A new style of skateboarding game using a simple two button mechanic. Tap the left side of your screen to make your skater move. Hold the left side of your screen to make your skater stop. hold the right side of your screen to make your skater crouch. Release the right side of your screen to make your skater Ollie. Crouch on a downhill to give your skater a boost of speed. Release at the right time on an up hill to make your skater launch higher into the air.

name: Jerry Wanker and the Quest to get Laid
description: Tonight is the night! Next door at the spooky mansion, the hottest girls in Blueball Falls are throwing the hottest and sexiest party in history!

name: Thrice
description: 5 rounds of brain gymnastics, each from a different category. 3 questions per round, all with the same answer. Guessing correctly earlier in each round will award more points.

name: Dead Cart
description: The fall was pretty bad. Your leg is definitely broken, but at least you escaped those things. And you've still got your gun. You've made it to the car park; there's a security guard's cart in the corner with the keys still in the ignition. You crawl into the seat and start it up. Now you can move faster, and hopefully escape.

name: Do Not Take This Cat Home
description: You find a cute cat all alone in an alley. What will you do?

name: Grave Digger
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega R-Type
description: It's R-Type arcade action for your SEGA 16-bit System! An unofficial port of R-Type for Sega Mega Drive/Genesis.

name: Indian Vice City: Heroes
description: Become a superhero and explore an open world, help people, defeat enemies, and do whatever you want as a superhero. You can choose to be a hero or a villain, it's your choice.

name: Little Runmo
description: The Game, is a 2D platformer game originating from an animated Youtube film called "Little Runmo" made by the creator Gooseworx. The Story revolves around a fictional videogame character trying to survive with his last life.

name: Suika Game Demake
description: Everyone's favorite Watermelon Game for PICO-8. Drop fruits and merge fruits that are alike.

name: Burnout
description:
Immerse yourself in a world of customizable cars that cater to your every racing desire. From sleek speedsters to rugged off-roaders, you can fine-tune your ride to match your unique style and tackle a multitude of thrilling challenges.
Drift around corners with finesse, zoom through lap races, and survive ruthless elimination rounds. Each event presents its own set of pulse-pounding challenges, and only the best will emerge victorious.

name: Crystal Daze
description: Crank out the crystals to save the kingdom?

name: Koko & Kebi: Crank Harrier
description: Two cats starring in this classic Pseudo3D shoot 'em up inspired by Space Harrier.

name: Shadow Overlord: The Beginning
description: As a player, you will have to lead your armies of undead and magical creatures to expand Your empire and defeat your enemies. With an exciting plot and a challenging gameplay, this game will take you through epic and dangerous adventure battles while you become the most powerful ruler.

name: LabWatch
description: LabWatch is an atmospheric horror / strategy / puzzle game where you must make sure every machine is working while avoiding dangerous enemies. Look through cameras to see which machines are not working and to know where enemies are currently roaming.

name: Killing Bullet
description: This is an exciting first-person shooting game. You need to defend against all enemy attacks and survive. You can use different types of firearms and throwing weapons to fight and kill every enemy you see.

name: Temporis Arts
description: Temporis Arts is Pretty Maniac Rhythm game with a circularly rotating Judgement Line! What you have to do in a spinning, sounding world is just - hit the notes in Tempo!

name: Retro Combat
description: Casual FPS, no microtransactions. Play online or with bots with machine guns, tanks, and planes.

name: So Much Stuff 4: Bits & Bobs
description: Uncover an abundance of new stuff in this exciting sequel!

name: Pumpkinman
description: Pumpkinman is variation of classical arcade games in Halloween setting. Travel through world of mystery, full of creatures from tales and horror stories. Improve Your skills and face final adversity.

name: Let Them Fall
description: Let Them Fall is a dynamic puzzle-strategy game. Transport objects using conveyor belts to the target zone. With each level, the game gets tougher with diverse shapes, colors, and limited space on procedurally generated maps. Will you take up the challenge?

name: Tiny Candy Guardian
description: A cute and exciting VR shooting game. Become a wizard guarding Candy Island, use candy magic to feed various mouthy fantasy creatures and repel them all.

name: Tenioha! feat. Mami
description: In this 2022 Moe Game Award–winning dark romance VN, step into the shoes of a submissive young corporate cog whose dream of a big-city bachelor’s lifestyle remains elusive—that is, until he catches the captivating gaze of one Mami Himekawa, his dommy-mommy, slightly older coworker...

name: Split Square
description: Split Square is a deck building rogue-like game featuring cute pixel characters. Defeat all enemies in a random block space and collect rewards to build a stronger deck!

name: Hero World
description: This is Hero World, the new platform and turn-based game by QVIK GAMEZ! The barriers of time and space have been shattered. Creatures from a mystical realm have entered our world. Heroes from across the multiverse have emerged to stop the creatures of darkness.

name: A Spooky Teaparty
description: Take the role of Rover, Summer, Britton and Marina in this fun, exploration-based Halloween adventure that takes place just after the events of Aplestia! Find treats, solve puzzles, battle with spooky monsters, enter secret rooms and meet with undead, funny characters! Welcome to Duruduru Castle!

name: Maximum Velocity
description:
Maximum Velocity is a high-stakes, high-speed racing game looking to shake up the racing genre forever. Join your friends and take on challenges in an immersive, ever-changing world. Drift, drag, or sprint your way around Industrial City and discover hidden secrets to the lore and ever-evolving story.
Drive the way you want to.

Upgrade your vehicles to handle the way you want them to. Make them as fast as you want or as drifty as you wish. You are in control of your car and how it handles. Unlock performance parts by exploring the city and doing challenges to get rewards and upgrades.

name: Roboplant
description: Design, build and manage your own hydroponic farm on Mars. Place buildings and machinery, hire robot workers, grow food, research new technologies, manage contracts and avoid being destroyed by random space events!

name: La Jupo Vania: The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Communion
description: Two teenage girls. One abandoned church. ??? survivors.

name: SoulSync City
description: A cyberpunk movement shooter based on momentum and speed.

name: ZX Terror House
description:
You are alone in the middle of a stormy night, trapped in your broken-down car on a deserted road. The darkness is palpable, and the wind moans like an echoing wail. Desperate to find help, you venture through a shadowy cemetery that stretches in the direction of the only source of light you glimpse: an ancient mansion shrouded in terrifying legends.

As you make your way among the graves, killer bats flutter in the sky, emitting bloodcurdling screeches. The tombstones seem to come to life, lurching and lunging toward you, as if they have a will of their own to stop you at all costs. Every step you take is filled with danger and suspense, as you struggle through this cursed graveyard and reach the mansion of terror in search of salvation.

Finally, you make it through the cemetery riddled with killer bats and deadly tombstones, arriving at the entrance to the mansion of terror. However, what you find inside is even more terrifying than you had imagined. As you enter the shadows of the mansion, you come face to face with three legendary figures of terror: Dracula, the Count of Vampires, the Werewolf and the Mummy.

Dracula, with his piercing gaze and sharp fangs, stares at you with vampiric hunger. The Werewolf, with deadly claws and glowing eyes, lies in wait, ready for the hunt. The Mummy, swathed in bandages and slow but relentless, advances toward you with sinister purpose.

You are in the midst of an encounter with horror itself. Your heart is pounding as you face these classic horror monsters while finding a way to survive and escape from the mansion of terror, unraveling the mysteries that envelop it.

From out of the shadows emerges an even more terrifying figure: The Grim Reaper, holding a deadly scythe. With each swing of the scythe, you feel the cold wind of death brush against your skin. You must be quick and cunning to dodge his attacks.

You use your dodging skills and manage to avoid Death's scythe in a deadly dance. Finally, you find the opportunity to counterattack, and bravely take on Frankenstein. After a fierce fight, you manage to defeat him and the giant falls to the ground, inert.

Finally, you discover an ancient coffin that contains the secrets of the heart of the beast and the way to escape from this world of nightmares.

You have managed to overcome all the horrors, defeat the monsters and find the solution to escape from the mansion of terror. Finally, you can breathe a sigh of relief, knowing that you have prevailed in this suspenseful and dangerous game. Congratulations on your bravery and determination! Or maybe NOT?

Yeah this is actually the first and only Potato Sack Racing game, it’s almost like it’s not a good idea to make a game about Potato Sack Racing, it’s pretty fun to say Potato Sack Racing. description: The player plays as a photographer, owns a photography studio, and works with beautiful models to take photos according to the customized requirements of clients, in order to earn commission.

name: A Fool's Art Gallery
description: A Fool's Art Gallery contains over 20 years of visual content by one mushroom cultist Canadian artist. You are a flying magical mask who s*!*s stars; be sure to look for secret doors to reveal hidden content as you explore the gallery at large. Hundreds of works of art await you!

name: Drift.Wav
description: Drift.Wav is a casual drifting game with a synthwave inspired aesthetic. This game is not meant to replicate / simulate actual drift mechanics, but more serve as a fun & relaxing game where you can slide in a synthwave inspired world. See if you can drift your way to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Cuckold Chair Simulator 2023
description: Welcome to the captivating world of Cuckold Chair Simulator 2023! This unique game combines an intriguing storyline with the engaging gameplay of Idle and Clicker genres.

name: Crystalish
description: Crystalish - A side-view game with a physical world where the player must destroy blocks in a certain amount while controlling the balance of the fish and not allowing it to fall off the screen.

name: Slender: The Arrival
description: Slender Man returns more terrifying than ever. You're on your own. No one to help you. No one to hear you scream. Relive the horror all over again with cutting edge visuals for the 10th Anniversary Update and experience survival horror at its finest.

name: PolyCity Stories: The Affair
description: The first short story from PolyCity. A point and click adventure delving into the dark and dirty polygonated corners of the City of angles... mostly right angles. The Affair follows a soft boiled/over easy private detective as he unpicks an organised crime syndicate operating across the city.

name: NecroAttack!
description: The army of the undead is attacking!!! The fate of the kingdom is at stake! Faced with the tide of undead, the young princess decided to step forward and lead the people to confront the enemy, explore unknown places... perhaps even uncover the mystery behind the disaster?

name: Love Love Candy
description: Choose your favorite girl and help her to complete a very popular phone game to unlock fashionable dresses for her avatar. As you guide and support them, they'll express their gratitude for you in many ways!

name: Police Heroes
description: Use multiple heroes, each with their own choices, abilities and play style to defeat the zombie apocalypse! Play several stages in different locations, against hordes of increasingly stronger and more dangerous zombies. All this with a unique mechanic where damage equals money!

name: Backrooms Descent
description: If you are not careful enough, you may end up in that place, the place some call The Backrooms. The Backrooms of existence, a hellish dimension of infinite maze-like constructs, each level pushing deeper into the despair. Could you, a normal person find the way out? Dive deeper into the horror

name: Scorphius
description: You have survived the plague. Set in the dark world of Scorpion you will delve into the dungeons and travel high up into the heavens to put an end to the plague. The focus is on the adventure, combat and powerful items and passive skills which allows character customization.

name: The Happyhills Homicide
description:
Welcome to Happyhills, the place where you can indulge your deepest desires, make your wildest dreams come true, and slaughter anyone in any way you want. In this case, all three of these are the same.

Play as a stylish 80's style slasher and kill your way through different levels. Remember: professionals have standards, kill every target in an unique way and do not get caught, spoils the fun.

name: Planet S
description: Planet S is a real-time strategy game where your goal is to colonize multiple planets in a solar system to advance your civilization, build a city and supply it to grow your faction.

name: World War ToonZ
description: Navigate across the city while surviving wave after wave of spectacular zombie attacks in this dramatic, high-action zombie apocalypse. As you progress deeper into the apocalypse, join your fellow troops in multiplayer to discover who will reign supreme as the final survivor.

name: Light Crawler
description: A first-person dungeon crawler where you explore a procedurally generated dark world with dungeons. You only have your lantern for light. Don't let it run out as you explore the world and dungeons.

name: Sands of Aura
description: Sands of Aura is an open-world action adventure with a fantasy setting of a realm in its twilight--a world buried beneath a sea of sand. Sail across the sandseas to return life to a dying world in an unforgettable experience that is equal parts engaging story and unrelenting, souls-like combat.

name: Princess of Zeven
description: After the family's succession trial puts Princess Leticia's corrupt brother, Prince Tyros, as the new heir to the throne. Leticia is forced to act. Traveling in disguise, she heads to the dangerous port city of Zeven, to face her destiny.

name: Fling with a Tiefling
description: Fling with a Tiefling is a short fantasy romance visual novel that follows you, an adventurer whose journey is about to come to an end. With tonight potentially being the last night with your treasured Tiefling companion Karrus, how will you spend it with him?

name: A Little to the Left: Trick or Tidy
description: Five ghoulish new puzzles inbound for the season of scares.

name: A Hell of a Bloody Dragon
description:
In this Open World Horror Adventure FPS, You have been miraculously resurrected from the dead with a noble mission: to capture a magnificent dragon for the Red Lord, who believes that this act will bring happiness to his kingdom.

Embark on a perilous journey and gather essential tools along the way to aid you in successfully capturing the dragon and ultimately bring joy to the heart of the Red Lord.

You will rediscover yourself and go through some horrific challenges before going home.

name: Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Upgrade
description:

Alan Wake 2 Deluxe Upgrade includes:
- Expansion Pass
- Night Springs Expansion (additional story content)
- Lake House Expansion (additional story content)

name: BorielZONE
description:
You are the commander of a defense tower, surrounded by enemy tanks. Your mission: destroy as many as possible before they destroy you. Tanks will change its color from green to yellow and red before shooting. Kill the red tanks for bonus!

You have a laser to destroy the tanks close and far away, a shield to repulse the enemy, and a radar to detect your enemies. Your laser (L) and shield (S) can get overheated so use them wisely! When your energy (E) is empty, you will be destroyed. The enemy tanks will shoot you also when you cannot see them, so watch your radar!

name: Cleany's Window Service
description: You get a request from an unknown client. They need you to clean their windows during the night. Given the look of their luxurious home, you expect a big payout for your service.

name: Teddy
description: A short psychological horror game. As spirits haunt you, your goal is to survive long enough to piece together the world around you.

name: Darkland 2
description:
A cosmic cloud has shrouded the land in permanent darkness. Red death rains like blood. Monsters from beyond lurk in the shadows, spawning their evil offspring. Fight them with light and fire, find a sanctuary. Survive this unholy night.

The controls guide the player character, and a flashlight that illuminates the ground ahead. Press fire to use the gun. Gunfire will only strike an illuminated spot, or at close point-black range near the player character. If you let the monsters or their firepower hit the player character you will lose a life. A bonus life is awarded for every 10,000 points.

Since seeing another human?

Since having grandma's home-made baked potatoes?

Nelly lost all the balls she played with. Tommy proposed to help her.
He will need to explore the room-mazed environment to find all the balls. Each room will prepare dangers for him, and Tommy will have to avoid them by running and jumping.

name: Heros Fight Battle royal

name: Stagelands: Eternal Defense
description: Defend your lands from crowds of enemies! Create a unique multi-floor defense of your kingdom! Arrange your troops wisely, use ancient magic, repel the onslaught of the enemy!

name: Fly Wheel
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping world of Fly Wheel, where sparks fly in a spectacular display of robotics mayhem! Fly Wheel is a thrilling combat sports game that pits competitors against each other in an excitement arena, get ready to enter the arena of fierce combat, Join the competition now.

name: Cozy Village
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of Cozy Village, where tranquility and adventure intertwine in a picturesque setting. Immerse yourself in a heartwarming village exploration game that invites you to uncover hidden treasures and unravel the mysteries of this charming hamlet.

name: Infrared
description: You find yourself lost in the middle of nowhere. The only way to leave is to fuel up your car. But to do so, you'll have to venture into this desolate forest to find a way to unlock the gas station. But, every bit of flesh in your body screams that you are not alone...

name: RoGlass
description: RoGlass is a tile-based roguelite puzzle game where you place unique tiles to score points and unlock new spaces. Reset the board once you're out of tiles but keep progress on achievements, unlocks, etc. Keep expanding the board and try to unlock every achievement!

name: FPVSIM Drone Simulator
description: FPVSIM is an FPV simulator that combines great graphics with great stick feel, featuring high consistency with its machine learning powered quadrotor dynamics engine that's also also hand tuned by top drone racers around the world.

name: Honked: A Clown Noir
description: Honked! is a narrative-adventure game about a mysterious world of Clowns where not all is as it seems.

name: Lumins and Shades

name: Legion TD 2: Floating Isles Campaign
description: A 10-15 hour singleplayer/co-operative campaign playable with 1-4 players.

name: Suns of Wiraqocha
description: Help the God Wiraqocha to recover all the stolen suns that have been hidden in different dimensions, which you can access through the Great Gate of the Sun, to return light to the Milky Way.

name: Coffee Talk 1+2 Double Pack Edition
description: Coffee Talk is a coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator about listening to fantasy-inspired modern peoples’ problems and helping them by serving up a warm drink or two. The Double Shot bundles both Coffee Talk 1 standard edition and Coffee Talk 2 collector’s editions together. Letting new players and existing fans get both games physically along with a large cup of goodies.

name: Long Time No See
description: A short, cozy, narrative-driven Halloween game about three friends reuniting to spend a stormy Halloween night together in a haunted house.

name: Terminator: Resistance - Complete Edition
description: Terminator: Resistance - Complete Edition bundles an enhanced version of Terminator: Resistance with the Annihilation Line Narrative Expansion and Infiltrator Mode in one complete package.

name: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Complete Edition
description: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Complete Edition offers a thrilling fashion adventure! Customize your favorite Bratz character, explore Stilesville and beyond. Complete quests, play bratitude-filled minigames, and chase the most significant stories while creating the ultimate fashion magazine. Includes Girls Nite Out and Pretty ‘N' Punk Fashion Packs.

name: Monsters of Mican
description: Welcome to Mican! Explore a hand-crafted series of dungeons in this first person party based RPG (Blobber) inspired by classics such as Might and Magic and Wizardry. Can you put a stop to the monsters' mysterious plan and discover the ancient secrets of the Amalgam Anomaly?

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Cozy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Marsh
description: Face-off against wacky, cartoony, brought to life objects in this 2D platforming shooter! Challenge your cute squishy self to get the highest of scores, up the difficulties and find the many secrets.

name: I Commissioned Some Frogs 2
description: I paid more artists to hide frogs and flies in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Starheim
description: Starheim is a free to play spaceship piloting MMO set in a universe based on Norse mythology. Materials collected by destroying AI ships, other players, and mining asteroids can be used to upgrade your ship, with dozens of models to choose from on your journey from a small fighter to a dreadnought.

name: Cosmo's Delivery and Logistics
description: Cosmo's Delivery and Logistics is a poker deck-builder set in space. Asteroid County is a notorious den of poker cheats -- can Cosmo beat them at their own game?

name: I Love Finding Wild Friends

name: Mining Mechs
description: Unleash your inner miner as you commandeer a high-tech Mining Mech! Mine for valuable resources and upgrade your mech for even bigger hauls as you explore the underground. Mining Mechs is a small game that you can play alone or with up to 7 friends in online co-op and offers 4-8 hours of gameplay.

name: My First Grade Fantasy Adventure
description: An early education game for kids with tons of mini-games and movies! Features draggable interactive objects, solving puzzles, & memory matches. All with visual and sound effects to support your child's learning. Enjoy this memorable adventure in one of the most comprehensive First Grade prep games!

name: Arena Breakout: Season 2 - Battle For the Port
description: The new season is set to introduce a ton of content such as the new Storm Warning mode, a new Port map, and a plethora of weapons. The upcoming season will also mark the beginning of a new series of seasons that have been planned for the game.

name: Rampage Agents
description: Rampage Agents is a VR game that fuses battle royale with multi-player action adventure games. Obtain powerful agents with unique powers and team up with your friends now!

name: DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue
description: Play as Poppy, Branch and more of your favorite DreamWorks Trolls as you explore, smash, dance and battle your way towards rescuing the Troll Kingdom from a melodic mastermind who’s trying to alter the Trolls’ musical harmony!

name: DreadFall
description: Embark on a chilling odyssey in Dreadfall, a horror platformer where you descend into your own nightmare. Fight monsters, solve puzzles, and upgrade your abilities as you journey through a haunting dream world.

name: Taimanin Asagi
description: Asagi was the strongest Taimanin in Tokyo, but after completing her last mission, she just wants to settle down and marry her lover Kyousuke. Her old nemesis has other plans, however, and creeps back from the dead to seek vengeance...

name: Blood Hunting
description: Blood Hunting is a first-person survival horror game by Holcomb Entertainment LLC. A true survival horror experience that sets the stage on how dangerous revenge can be... if you can survive it.

name: Formula Retro Racing: World Tour - Special Edition
description:
Formula Retro Racing: World Tour - Special Edition includes:
- Base Game
- 2 Free Stickers
- 6 New Unique Tracks
- Reversed Track Variants
- Bonus Gameplay & UI Features

name: Kraken Odyssey
description: Little kraken in danger! Dive into this 3D action game and avoid dangers. Explore worlds like beaches, jungles, mountains, dungeons. Unlock costumes, be a pirate or unicorn. Love octopuses, beach, adventure? Play Kraken Odyssey!

name: 30 Sport Games in 1
description:
Ready to win?!
"30 Sport Games in 1" is the ultimate game that brings together 30 different sports in one game!

name: Unmanned: Midnight Nightmare
description: Welcome to Megan’s Mall, the place where dreams come true! It’s your first day on the job as a security guard, and it’s going to be an experience you’ll never forget.

name: Terra Toy
description: Cozy planet building toy

name: Dragot
description: Dragot is a fast paced bullet hell dungeon crawler in which you live or die by the mysterious items you find hidden in each room; Fizzle out early or snowball your newly acquired powers to fight through all six areas and finally defeat the dragon that pursues you.

name: The Rings of Powder
description: "The Rings of Powder" is a fun and ironizing game combining exploration with the construction of an underground kingdom and elements of real -time strategy and idle. The project is an irony of both some legendary and less legendary movies and scenes from reality.

name: Alan Wake II: Deluxe Edition
description:
Alan Wake II: Deluxe Edition is a special edition of Alan Wake II.

It includes:

- Expansion Pass
- Night Springs Expansion (additional story content)

name: Eras Rising
description: In Eras Rising, follow a party of warriors as they journey to uncover why strange beasts have suddenly begun invading their homeland. Manipulate the enemy position and use terrain to your advantage to fend off the beasts in turn-based tactical combat!

name: Cult of Personality
description: Cult of Personality is an upcoming Social Deception Game that bends the rules of what players can see, do, and hear... In life, and death!

name: Tsetseg's Adventure
description: Tsetseg, the little witch, is in crisis. Her friends are taken and converted to bad guys by the Mad Wizard. Explore castle, fight Bosses, rescue friends, regain special power, and defeat Mad Wizard! A classic pixel style, 2D platformer game.

name: Cadleiu
description: "Everything here is destined to die without leaving a trace."Cadleiu is a movement shooter with robust melee mechanics and character progression, featuring permadeath and procedurally generated environments.

name: Grand Strokers
description: Comedic Horror RPG / JRPG that will leave you breathless with a sticky keyboard --- or offended! No holds barred, no filters. Pure unadulterated sexiness monster orgy goodness!! Features color tiers gear, a ton of monsters and enemies, multiple dungeons and even bosses you can recruit as characters!!

name: The Infernal Masquerade
description: The Infernal Masquerade is a gothic horror PS2 -inspired take on the classic minesweeper game along with resource management, where taking risks and doing speedy reveals gives you access to helper items that make it easier to find the hidden, masked vampires.

name: Returning to Mia
description: You reunite with Mia afther being apart for a year. What will happen next? Will you find love? Play and find out!

name: Project Survivor

name: Eggconsole Thexder PC-8801mkIISR
description:
When discussing retro robot-themed games, one masterpiece that always comes to mind is 'THEXDER'. This action-shooting game was released in 1985.

The player takes control of the hyper dual-armor "THEXDER," which can transform into both robot and fighter forms, and throws himself into the battle to destroy the magnetic field generator of the asteroid Nediam. The game is played in side-view and consists of 16 stages (plus 16 back stages).

In the battle against the enemy, you can use either the robot form, which has a tracking laser but inferior mobility, or the fighter form, which can only attack in the direction you are going but has superior mobility, depending on the situation. Barriers are also available, but if they are used too often, they will run out of energy, so they should be used only when the situation calls for it! You should use them only when you need them.

The game is based on the life system with no save function, so you only have one shot each time you play! The difficulty level of the game is high, so if you are good at it, please give it a try.

This is a masterpiece that has been carefully crafted with a world view, excellent mecha design, and smooth animation during transformation, not to mention the addictive nature that makes you want to play it over and over again despite its difficulty.

Together you'll scan objects, find hidden ducks, and observe science in action. You will complete four missions around giant ants, a tardigrade, a protist, and giant fungi that have accidentally been scaled up by using scientific concepts and scaling objects up and down yourself.

In addition to the base game, there is a Multiplayer Theater where players can invite their friends and watch Kurzgesagt videos together in VR. There's also a Mixed Reality Sandbox where players can bring objects and creatures they've unlocked in the game into their home.

name: Yakuzukuri Puzzle Yumeiro Yuramu
description:
Yakuzukuri Puzzle Yumeiru Yuramu, also known simply as Yumeiro Yuramu, is a falling-blocks puzzle game by Nippon Ichi Software.

The basic gameplay consists of the player dropping dominos of two colored blocks onto the playfield. When four blocks of the same color are connected, they form a tetromino. As the player forms patterns such as multiple same-colored tetrominoes connecting or tetrominos forming a square, a score counter next to the playfield will increase. When the player has a valid points-earning board, they may either finish the round to cash in their points, or continue to build, at the expense of possibly losing points if they fail to raise the value of their board.

The game can be either played solo or in versus mode against an opponent, either a CPU-controlled or human opponent. Versus-human play can be done either locally or online, with cross-platform play available between Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 players. When playing versus, each round the player whose board is worth more points will damage the opponent's HP with an amount equal to the value of their board. The first player to deplete their opponent's HP wins.
