NecroCity is a city-building economic strategy game, with a defense and combat system. The world of the dead is just in front of you!

name: Wetory
description: A child abandoned from the world immediately after birth due to a congenital disease When all the colors of the world were taken away by the villain, Realizing that his illness is the power to defeat the villain, Join us in our adventure to regain the color which lost to the villain!

name: Finis
description: FINIS is a puzzle game that explores 21 different universes. Each universe offers a different experience, terror, calm, destruction, war, progress... You can choose between 8 completely different paths and each path will take you to a unique ending.

name: Hamster on Rails
description:
“Hamster on Rails” is a 3D puzzle Nintendo-like rail builder game, bringing a relaxing experience, featuring popular concepts such as: Mine Wagons and Hamsters.

Travel through different worlds, building crazy railways to solve fun puzzles and thus making it possible to extract mineral resources to save the beloved people of the hamster village.

name: Kickback Slug: Cosmic Courier
description: Kickback Slug: Cosmic Courier is a fun, fast-paced physics game where you must exploit the kickback of your guns to navigate a series of increasingly difficult obstacles across a organic planet floating through space.

name: Seaside Driving
description: Chill & drive 80's style. Get into your car and cruise endlessly while listening to synthwave tracks.

name: The Shadows Lengthen
description: A first-person, open-world, horror indie game made only in Blender!

name: The Sirena Expedition
description: The Sirena Expedition is short PSX-style horror-platformer in which you explore a mysterious underwater facility.

name: Billy's Nightmare
description: A roguelike game where you use abilities & items based on child logic to help Billy fight his nightmare. Poison bullies with a pair of Stinky Socks, set creepy toys on fire with a Magnifying Glass or make them step on some painful Pego Bricks!

name: The Unliving
description: Raise the dead as a fearsome Necromancer in the dark world of The Unliving! Lead your undead armies into the endless fight in this rogue-lite action RPG game. Burn cities to ash with devastating magic spells, slay epic bosses and turn your enemies into morbid servants.

name: Intruders
description: Intruders is a survival horror / strategy game where you get kidnapped and in order to save your life you will need to survive five nights. Use camera system and environment to defend yourself against several intruders.

name: HHG Megami no Shuuen
description: A SFW version of a Japanese Visual Novel.

name: Cup Heroes
description: A turn-based RPG with pachinko mechanics.

name: Pokemon Garbage Gold
description: To begin, Garbage Gold is a trashmon hack, meaning the player will only be able to obtain and use weak Pokemon. In most cases, these Pokemon will be less than 425 BST (combined base stat total). There are some exceptions, but this is the general rule. A wide variety of encounters are available, and are significantly different from vanilla Heart Gold. Evolution levels are changed, and some Pokemon wont evolve at all if the evolutions are too good.

name: Lab Cat
description: A sokoban game with portals and a cat

name: Copter
description: Copter is a simple, casual action game with interesting controls: the Playdate hand crank. Help a helicopter navigate to avoid obstacles and try to beat your own high scores.

name: Trepang2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Become the ultimate badass in Trepang2. Unleash hell on your enemies in this gory action-packed FPS set in the future and stop at nothing to get your revenge.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

- Trepang2 Full Game
- Season Pass including Survival Mode DLC (Available Now) and Story DLC coming soon.

name: Hotel Room Haunting
description: Inspired by the movie 1408 you must survive the night in the hotel room by not losing your own sanity. Immerse yourself in your overnight getaway, close the curtains, watch some TV, get some sleep if you can. Subject yourself to random events within the room as it tries to make you do things to lose the game.

name: Taimanin RPG Extasy
description: Super-popular Taimanin RPG is now available on Steam! The Taimanin take the stage in a classic turn-based RPG! Commander Skills, Formations, and Ultimate Skills... Make good use of them and be victorious! Battle alongside Taimanin whenever you want! From this day forth, you're a Taimanin!

name: Fright Night Sex Fest: We All Fuck Down Here
description: Meet Peniswet and Mike in this delirious new DLC for Fright Night Sex Fest. In the sewers awaits Peniswet the Slutty Clown, an ancient demon that feeds on poor virgin weak boys like Mike...

name: Vacuum
description: A quick-to-play text adventure with multiple endings!

name: Idle Champions: Minute the Marut Familiar Pack
description:
In this pack:

- Minute the Marut Familiar
- 6 Epic Potions of Speed
- 6 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength
- 6 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance
- 6 Epic Potions of Fire Breath
- 1 Epic Potion of the Gold Hunter
- 2000 Modron Component Pieces
- 1 Potion of Polish

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws: Pack - Battle Off Samar
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Bail or Jail: Character DLC Bundle 3
description: Thieves Alisa and Alex and Officer Patches have arrived on the scene! This DLC contains the following: • Thief Alice • Thief Alex • Officer Patches • Treasure Lantern

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Overlord Campaign
description: Six man canvas tents, a steel mat landing strip and generous supplies of slippery mud clearly indicated they were preparing for the upcoming move to the continent with the front line invasion forces.

name: Otherworld Legends: Atomic Girl
description:
Skin for Anibella : Atomic Girl
Beneath the opulent neon-baptized countenance of Arcarune - the megapolitan hub of technological wonders - a syndicate of institutional malefactors scuttle to enact their Machiavellian machinations, while a coalition of the city's excelsiors - Atomic Girl and her companions - rise to meet them.
Time and time again, Anibella confides in not just her prodigious technological innovations and nonpareil rocket-saddled jockeying skills, but also the indefatigable teamwork of her fellow vigilantes to foil the sinister schemes of Arcarune's criminal underbelly.

name: Otherworld Legends: Sinistar Ruthven
description:
Skin for Ruthven : Sinistar Ruthven
For seven days and nights, Uriel Longinus, the Ferrum Daemonum, held his ground against the hundred thousand heavenly hosts who would compel his arraignment following his defiance of the Dictum Divinas. Ultimately battered and spent, Uriel was forced to abscond to the realm of man. Consciousness desperately waning, Uriel tethered his primordial animus to the form of a passing novitiate sword-brother - Ruthven - and over the course of the following days and years, clandestinely aided the latter in the honing of his swordcraft, intending to subjugate his mortal corpus once his own faculties were redeemed.
As Ruthven's mettle was whetted to a fine point, so too undeniably brilliant did its glint reflect among the rank and file of his House. Yet, on one fateful day where a sparring duel was to be arranged, Ruthven, in a moment of hubris, unleashed a strike fortified by livid Daemonic energy, instantly damning him as an irredeemable traitor to be hunted for all time. Hopeless and outnumbered against his former kin, Ruthven made one final appeal to Uriel, who answered by manifesting into being - and rebuking their beleaguering troupe of would-be executioners with ruthless efficiency - an act that was apparent in its message to the Celestial Realm. As celestial champions, one after another, set themselves to tracking down the revived Ferrum Daemonum and his human servitor to enforce their demise, the Daemonic duo steel themselves for a stand to the death... for a chance to live.

name: Otherworld Legends: Synthia
description:
Hero Synthia
A cybernetically augmented and neurally conditioned transhuman, Synthia is able to bring to bear her hulking arsenal of Exoframe to sow carnage among enemies with terrifying ease.
Using exoframe builds up Heat. Upon reaching a threshold, you enter an Overheat state with heightened attack speed and movement speed, as well as a chance to burn enemies with your normal attack.
An actively-firing exoframe can be manually halted and cooled down by holding down its corresponding skill button.
If allowed to peak, excess Heat will trigger an Overload, rendering you unable to perform any action for a time in addition to initiating an extended cooldown on all skills.

name: Otherworld Legends: Ourania
description:
Hero Ourania
Drifts from the perennially snowbound steppes ever accompany the ethereally graceful Ourania, sweeping sin from every corner of the world and delivering her blessings in their stead. Doted upon by the spirits of her animistic ancestors, the fledgeling shamaness swirls and glissades through the immaculate landscape with unfettered carefreeness, her eyes bright as a sky after rain and her elfin form brimming with numinous potential.
[h3]Mark of Shamaness:[/h3]
Your skills and normal attacks apply a stacking Mark of Shamaness on enemies. Once the Mark has reached 8 stacks, your next normal attack will cause it to detonate, dealing damage.
You can absorb Mark of Shamaness from enemies by slaying them or holding down dodge, converting the Marks into Shamanic Mana. Once your Shamanic Mana is full, you gain the ability to transform into the Whisper of Spirit by holding down dodge.
[h3]Whisper of Spirit:[/h3]
You take on the form of a windborne plume that can freely traverse the environment, dealing high damage to enemies in your path and slowing them. Once the form ends, dodge will be unusable for a time.

name: Brawlhalla: BCX 2023 Pack
description: Be a part of the eighth annual Brawlhalla World Championship with the BCX 2023 Pack! This limited time pack contains 300 Mammoth Coins, the BCX 2023 Avatar and an exclusive Mammoth Gentle-fan Sidekick. A must-have for followers of Brawlhalla esports!

name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Rivera's Revenge
description: Turn on your bike light to explore the secret cave of Sierra Rivera's lost trail in this free DLC. Collect the fire elemental customization set by playing through the brand-new challenges. Saddle up and face Rivera's Revenge in the Lonely Mountains.

name: The Little Mermaid: Visual Harmony
description: Immerse yourself in a magical tale with dazzling illustrations as you live a new adventure in the underwater world of The Little Mermaid.

name: Sea of Conquest
description: Command your ship, recruit pirates and rule the vast ocean!

name: Warrior
description: This is a megawad (32 levels) with common story for all its levels. You are the warrior who fights and passes all levels step by step, combat after combat. Every next level starts where you've finished the previous.

name: Conquered Complex
description: Small, but punchy map and could be rough in some places. Takes about 10 mins to complete.

name: 8Floor Bundle 3 in 1
description:
This pack includes:
Gnomes Garden 8: Return of the Queen
Roads of Time
Roads of Time 2: Odyssey

name: Sesame's Haunting
description: Sesame's peaceful life of solitude takes an unexpected turn after she unleashes a poltergeist, courtesy of her mischievous neighbor and longtime nemesis, Rutabaga. Brew potions, grow plants, and problem-solve Sesame's ghostly dilemma in this cute and spooky minigame!

name: Fruit Salad
description: Fruit Salad is a cozy physics-based match 2 game where you drop and merge fruits together to try and beat the high score before you reach the top!

name: Kibitz Bugs
description:
Play Gomoku with your Twitch viewers!
Login with Twitch and Just chat to vote. The coordinate with the most votes is the chosen move.
Already popular on Twitch. Played by several streamers with 100k+ viewers!

name: Taimanin RPG Extasy
description: Super-popular Taimanin RPG is now available on Steam! The Taimanin take the stage in a classic turn-based RPG! Commander Skills, Formations, and Ultimate Skills... Make good use of them and be victorious! Battle alongside Taimanin whenever you want! From this day forth, you're a Taimanin!

name: Project Playtime: Phase 3 - Forsaken
description: Sin descripción

name: Affectionate Annie
description: Meet Annie, a super-affectionate girl who loves sex. She's the hostess at a small resort where she has playful, casual sex with almost everyone who visits. Her job is to ensure that guests enjoy their stay, and she is very good at her job. Play this interactive erotic story with a very happy ending.

name: Box Ninja
description: The ninja is trying to get to the door, but there are some annoying boxes in the way. Good thing this ninja has some crazy powerful legs! Those boxes need to be taught a lesson, so it is time to push, kick and break some boxes!

name: Hot Redheads
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Naga Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Selfie Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Sinister Nights
description: You are a guard of an abandoned workshop who will have to survive under the onslaught of animatronics. Use doors, tablet and many other things to survive

name: Infinite Arcana
description:
Infinite Arcana is an action Roguelike mobile game with a fantasy adventure theme.
Fist to flesh, heart-piercing fighting, you may enjoy the best action experience.
Randomly generated maps and monsters, endless floating isles to be explored;
Interesting game modes with random character skill builds more than 100 styles.
The mystery of "Infinite Arcana" is waiting to be unraveled, and the eroded continent is calling for your rescue.

name: Haunted House Builder
description: Build a haunted house and scare some guests.

name: Three Kingdoms: Battle of Generals
description: Three Kingdoms: Battle of Generals is a multi-player online real-time strategy game based on the Three Kingdoms history which recreates realistic landscapes in the world map. Look out for flank attacks and road blocks from your enemies when you explore the open world and build your city.

name: Buddy and Friends on Halloween
description: Halloween's here, and Buddy the cat and pals are set for 'tricks or treats' in the neighbourhood. But as they venture into the unknown, will compassion and kindness triumph over fear? Join these kittens in a heartwarming Halloween tale in this beautifully illustrated jigsaw puzzle game.

name: Cold Ground
description: Save the homeland of Dalina on an one-man army mission in this MSX-inspired action RPG.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: A Journey Across Continents
description: An epic journey that will test your wit, knowledge, and sense of adventure like never before.

name: Horror Gallery
description: Immerse yourself in a sinister narrative as you piece together the story through hints in this eerie place. Every step you take inches you closer to the truth.Will you uncover the chilling truth?

name: Midnight Acres
description: Experience Midnight Acres — an indie farming sim by day, and intense FPS by night. Unwind and battle on, all in one game as you grow and nurture your farm, plan and upgrade turrets and defenses, and engage in combat with horrifying beasts.

name: Reach the light
description: The precision platformer where you climb the biggest mountain in the world to reach the light. Explore mysterious places and meet weird creatures on this difficult journey!

name: Square Dungeon 2
description: "Square Dungeon 2" is a dungeon exploration + roguelite text-based indie game. The demon king left a prophecy to the human king before death that the warriors would betray him when the Armageddon came. As a warrior, what will you choose on the Armageddon?

name: Replay Boys
description: Band emergency! This was supposed to be Hannah’s day off, but now she’s been roped into managing The Replay Boys, an up-and-coming boy band. Make choices to stoke multi-timeline romances, keep the band from killing each other, and fight a resurrected ’80s pop star ghost. Can you manage?

name: Screams from the Past
description: Uncover the dark past of an orphanage, gather clues and evidence, solve puzzles, and unveil the truth in a gripping suspense game. Your main mission is to unravel the mystery. Get ready for shocking revelations as you immerse yourself in the intriguing and chilling atmosphere.

name: Alien Holocaust II: Invasion Earth
description: Alien Holocaust II: Invasion Earth is an upcoming sequel to Alien Holocaust, developed by Fernando Rodrigues Salvio and published by Bitnamic Software.

name: Cryptid
description: Cryptid is a single-player horror fps game that chronicles an experienced hunter and a creature's encounter from the perspective of the Body Cam.

name: Insanias
description: In Insanias you must explore what happened to find a truth that only you can find. To do so, you must be able to control your sanity to avoid falling into the madness that lurks around every corner. Are you ready to face your fears and discover the truth?

name: Backroom: Constructions
description: This game is a strange object where you, as a "Player" will have to construct a Backroom, but you are a human being, so getting something to eat is a task you should accomplish too,

name: Hexaverse Adventures
description: Experience the thrill of exploration in our VR game. Collect resources, battle through new challenges, and discover a mysterious new world. Play as a sword-wielding adventurer, aided by a trusty robot companion. Our playable demo showcases our unique concept, with plans for more levels, features, and interactions to come.

name: Citizens: On Mars
description: Experience the ultimate turn-based colony building game in Citizens: On Mars! As the leader of a fledgling Martian settlement, your mission is to develop a thriving colony amidst the harsh and unforgiving environment of the Red Planet.

name: Malice
description: Malice: Burn haunted objects, banish demons in a spooky mansion. Multiplayer or single-player options. Are you brave enough to survive?

name: Aleon's Nightmare 2
description: Welcome to the World of Nightmares! You play as Aleon, you woke up in an unfamiliar place. You need to understand what is going on and get help from the surrounding objects. The nightmare world includes different parts. Castle, Kingdom, Forest, and Dungeon.

name: Another Bar Game
description: A casual action game where you serve craft beer to thirsty bar guests. Become the most popular bartender in town! Wash glasses, clean tables and keep everybody happy! From the creator of Dude, Where Is My Beer?

name: Maeldor: Enhanced Edition
description: Ready to fight against the ultimate evil? A 2D Action-Adventure Platformer with RPG elements in it! Control one of 3 legendary heroes in this adventure filled with magic, enemies, traps, puzzles, treasures and more! Upgrade your characters skills & abilities as you explore the vast lands of Maeldor!

name: Battle Grid
description: Face relentless alien hordes, collect their resources and assemble an unstoppable squadron of mechs! In this Action Roguelite, discover game-breaking synergies, mix and match weapons and units, unlock upgrades, harvest and conquer an alien planet.

name: Vampire Slayer: New Blood
description: Vampire Slayer: New Blood is a multiplayer first-person action shooter. Locations are varied and detailed, and each character comes with its own unique weapons and abilities. Pick a side, squad up, and master a rising roster of fearless characters in this fast-paced bloody FPS.

name: AI Roguelite
description: Infinite text-based RPG, powered by cutting-edge AI technology which runs on your graphics card.

name: Midnight Heist
description: Go on heists through Midnight City alone or with up to three friends to fulfill tasks as a hacker for various organizations. Improve your reputation, earn money, customize your character and uncover the secrets of shady companies in this co-op horror game.

name: Stray Souls
description:
Enter a world of nightmares in this third person, action-horror, inspired by the classics of the genre. Fight terrifying creatures, solve mind-bending puzzles, and unravel a horrid family secret to expose the chilling truth behind your existence.

Unlock the secrets hidden within the haunted town of Aspen Falls, featuring gruesome enemy encounters, epic bosses, cunning puzzles, and a deep story where not everyone is who they seem. Play as Daniel – an average teenager whose life is forever changed after inheriting the home of his estranged grandmother and meeting a mysterious woman with intimate knowledge about his family, the house, and its shocking connection to his past. The gameplay elements inspired by classic horror combat with souls-like precision, put a fresh spin on the modern action-horror genre.

name: It's Dungeon Time!
description: It's Dungeon Time is a simple 2d puzzle casual game. Start out with the simple soldier or warrior class. Descend into the dungeon and survive against hoards of skeletons, zombies and other creatures.

name: It's Harvest Time!
description: It's Harvest time is a simple 2d puzzle casual game. Be the simple farmer at a farmstead on the countryside. Build and upgrade the farm. Protect the farm animals from wild animals.

name: Stone Guardian
description: Stone Guardian is a low-poly style adventure 3D platformer where you play as a guardian that needs to find the disappeared Stone. To find it he needs to enter the magical world and face challenges.

name: Beast
description: Beast is a role-playing game merged with turn-based skirmish strategy set in a reclusive plague-infested land filled with conflict and religious delusion. Inspired by the heretic schism between the Bogomil gnostic sect and the Eastern Orthodox Church.

name: Premeow League
description:
The Universe Need US! Let's Spoil Cat and Free the Universe.
We are the last stand to free the universe from Tyranny Cat Alien- Empurrer from Premeow76 Galaxy.
Spoil the cats and build your own Purrfect football team to compete in Premeow League and Win against Empurrer.

name: Thief Monsters
description:
An expesive diamond has stolen from a museum. Your job is determinate whose stole the diamond and at what time.There are 5 suspects in the diamond theft.
The five suspects were wandering through a nine room museum from 13:00 to 24:00. When you think you know who is guilty of the theft and the time the diamond was stolen, proceed with the accusation.

name: Strange Toilet: The Forgotten Shit
description: In the quiet neighborhood where Nathan and Sarah live, there is an ominous presence. A potential threat from a murderer on the loose. The residents did not expect that on this peaceful evening, they would be confronted with a grim reality they never anticipated

name: Cities: Skylines II - San Francisco Set
description: Bring some sunny vibes to your city with this San Francisco themed set. A Muscle Car Garage building, 5 different Muscle car models and a police vehicle will spruce up your bustling beach city. Included in the set is also the iconic Golden Gate Bridge and of course - a San Francisco map.

name: Cortex Chronicles 2: The Ride of Jax Riven
description: A whole underworld exists in the old tunnels below Cortex City. Bikers called the D-Boys risk their lives to deliver packages and keep the life of the undercity pumping. You are Jax Riven, a D-Boy that gets tangled in a delivery gone wrong.

name: 1-Bit Halloween
description: 1-Bit Halloween focuses on a home visit that a priest makes to a family. The game is on a single map with all the rooms of the house being visible to the player (like Dogville movie, in which you could see everything that happened in different places at once).

name: Out of Gas
description:
Travel through space as you mine for resources like gold, iron, oxygen, and gems. Use collected resources at space stations to upgrade guns and shields and improve gas usage. Mostly a peaceful game of exploration, you will have to monitor your ship's gas and ammo usage and may occasionally attract the attention of pirates who will attempt to destroy your ship.

In Out of Gas, the environment beyond the starting area is procedurally generated and completely random. Apart from the special colored asteroids, the dropped resources are also completely random. There is a chance that you will encounter a trade post, where you can trade gems for large amounts of other resources such as gold, iron, and oxygen.

name: Cropsmare!
description: Cropsmare! is a sokoban-like puzzle game inspired by Adventures of Lolo.

name: It Paints Me
description: It Paints Me is a short Gothic horror visual novel about art, pain, and love.

name: Injection π23: No Name, No Number - Expansion Events
description: 'Halloween' and 'Christmas' special events

name: Smite x RuneScape Premium Bundle
description: Smite x RuneScape continues with this epic crossover bundle, featuring Sandwich Lady Amaterasu and Black Armor Bellona. Plus get 2 RuneScape chest rolls! Available for a limited time - don't miss out on this great bundle!

name: Trepang2: Survival Mode
description: Test your ultimate badass skills with the Trepang2 Survival Mode DLC.

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Click or Treat
description: The "Click or Treat" DLC serves as an expansion to the base game, introducing a new island within the HUB area. This island will feature portals leading to three spooky-themed levels, each with a unique gameplay focus.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set
description: Take the perfect cover with the Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set for Security and paint the battlegrounds with your personal touch. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Nicotero Leatherface
description: From the mind of legendary special make-up effects creator, producer, and director Greg Nicotero, comes this twisted new Leatherface created exclusively for The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.

name: Brutalist Jam 2
description: Over three and a half weeks, mappers created maps loosely centered around the Brutalism architectural movement. From concrete hellscapes to brutal liminal voids, imaginations and creativity ran wild in this jam, and created some truly stunning experiences! Built in the gameplay mod Copper (included), the pack includes 30 levels lovingly crafted by mappers both new and veteran, many maps created by first time mappers.

name: Gleam and The Eternal Night
description: Gleam has been chosen by The Covenant to seek out The Great Star and put an end to The Eternal Night. On her way, she encounters something...

name: Soulbound
description: Embark on a journey through time and challenge in Soulbound, an MMORPG Extraction Roguelike that melds a captivating pixel art world with a narrative that bends the very concept of time. Here, extraction isn’t just a mechanic; it's the heart of your adventure.

name: Metal Gear Solid Master Collection: Volume 1 - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Uni
description: A puzzle game that can be played with one hand.

name: Cities: Skylines II - Ultimate Edition
description: Raise a city from the ground up and transform it into a thriving metropolis with the most realistic city builder ever. Push your creativity and problem-solving to build on a scale you've never experienced. With deep simulation and a living economy, this is world-building without limits.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 1+2+3 Bundle
description: The Year 1+2+3 Bundle gives you instant access to 32 cosmetic sets from the Year 1 and Year 2 Passes, and 4 additional reward items from the Year 2 Pass. Also includes the 16 already released or upcoming cosmetic sets from the Year 3 Pass. Customize your Security and Insurgent soldiers from head to toe with brand new gear and weapon skins.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Digital Splatter Skin Set
description: Take the perfect cover with the Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set for Security and paint the battlegrounds with your personal touch. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 3 Pass
description: Kit yourself out, soldier! The Year 3 Pass for Insurgency: Sandstorm will give you one year of cosmetic sets from the four upcoming Operations!

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Mountain Tactical Gear Set
description: Embark on a thrilling battle with the Mountain Tactical Gear Set for Security! Gear up and conquer any rugged terrain that stands in your way. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Onslaught Set Bundle
description: Get ready for an explosive new update in Insurgency: Sandstorm! Bring unmatched destruction to the battlefield and dominate your enemies with the Onslaught Set Bundle of premium gear items and weapon skins.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Slaughter Family Bloody Skins Pack
description: Show off your lust for brutality with these blood-soaked variants of the Family's default outfit. Includes 1 bloody skin for Leatherface, The Cook, The Hitchhiker, Sissy, and Johnny.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Ana Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Ana.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Connie Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Connie.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Julie Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Julie.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Leland Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Leland.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Sonny Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Sonny.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Woodburn Weapon Skin Set
description: Bring a touch of timeless elegance to your arsenal and embrace the charm of classic wood weapons with the Woodburn Weapon Skin Set for Insurgents. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Mountain Nomad Gear Set
description: Combine the rugged resilience of nomadic attire and the tactical prowess of combat gear with the Mountain Nomad Gear Set for Insurgents. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.
